game.name: Snowy Kitty Adventure
game.description:
Like you, this cute snowy kitty loves the winter season. Today you find this cute kitty in a big problem as she has lost her home key somewhere on her way. She has to return its home in a hurry but unable to find her key. You join Snowy Kitty Adventure game as her friend and guide her to spot the key fast so that kitty escort to her home. Do not forget to take the right turn from doors as it will be difficult for the kitty to turn by herself. 
Remember the platform is full of multiple obstacles that will try to stop her from moving forward in this cute adventure game. You can control her movements through the mouse on desktop and swapping the screen on mobile phone. The best part about this wonderful puzzle game is that kitty can move without your help. Jump and avoid the dangers and obstacles by pushing a corresponding button! Find a key and open up the door in each level of this cute html5 platform game! 
Be careful and avoid falling down or being damaged by any of the creatures and obstacles on your way! The direction of special checkpoints can also be changed with the movements of kitty. You can also help your kitty to find some food in the form of mice and birds. There are 20 unique and challenging levels to complete and have fun in this one of the best adventure games for free to play. You can enjoy it without installing any extra app or software. Challenge your finding abilities to clear all the stages of this funny game!

game.webControlKeys: LEFT CLICK OF MOUSE  OR UP ARROW TO JUMP,L R ARROW TO MOVE THE KITTY
